tswitem.name: Keziah Mason's Ring
tswitem.tooltip:
Â 
Keziah Mason's Ring
Finger Talisman (QL 10.9 Epic)
Character Bound
+972 Attack Raiting
Whenever your attack both critically hits and penetrates, the target also becomes Afflicted with a damage over time effect that deals Combat Power/10.6 physical damage every second for 7 seconds.
While afflicted with this effect, the target takes 5% more damage from all sources. The duration of this effect is not refreshed when reapplied.
Empty Glyph Slot
